name: Cowgirl Crusade
description:
Cowgirl Crusade is a on rails, arcade shooter where the player takes control of a mercenary protecting their mining facility by  taking down waves of enemies and fighting bosses.

WASD To move the ship

Mouse to aim

Left click to shoot

Designers:

  • Jade Baumanis
  • Lucas Brown
  • Alexander Edwards
  • Matthew Liddiard
  • Benjamin Tedmanson

Programmer:

  • Alex Giglia

Artists:

  • Anakin Kaldy
  • Bailey Rayko
  • Lloyd Tuck
